mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_application (teacher_id, teacher_name, type, content, target_id, reason, status, create_time) VALUES (#{teacherId}, #{teacherName}, #{type}, #{content}, #{targetId}, #{reason}, 'PENDING', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_application WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sys_application WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_application SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
